title: Unable to use mobile data when connected to WiFi network with no internet.
content: If I connect to a WiFi network without internet it is very difficult to maintain a data connection through LTE. Upon connecting to said WiFi I receive a notification alerting me that it has no internet connection. If I select "stay connected" it automatically disables my LTE data. If I ignore the notification it will disconnect me from that WiFi network and automatically connect to a saved network with an internet connection. The only work around I have found is to forget any saved networks within range. I can then stay connected to the WiFi that has no internet while also using LTE data. This is not ideal. I have enabled every option I can find for keeping mobile data active but still not working correctly. This feels like a bug in the Android OS. Any insight from the community would be helpful.
